com.mygdx.hanto.implementation.common

Class Coordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.hanto.implementation.common.Coordinate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HantoCoordinate

    public class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object
implements HantoCoordinate
    Implementation of HantoCoordinate that is used in the concrete HantoGame implementations.
    Version:
    Feb 2, 2013
    Author:
    Peng Ren

      • guarrenteedCoordinate

        public static Coordinate guarrenteedCoordinate(HantoCoordinate hantoCoordinate)
        A type of factory method that guarantees that the client has a Coordinate to work with. If the actual parameter is a HantoCoordinate that is not a coordinate, this method returns a corresponding Coordinate object. Otherwise, it simply returns the argument.
        Parameters:
        hantoCoordinate - An HantoCoordinate given
        Returns:
        the guaranteed Coordinate object

      • isAdjacentTo

        public boolean isAdjacentTo(Coordinate c)
        Determine if this coordinate is adjacent to the specified coordinate.
        Parameters:
        c - The coordinate to check for adjacency to this coordinate
        Returns:
        true if c is adjacent to this coordinate, false otherwise

      • getNeighbors

        public Coordinate[] getNeighbors()
        Get all the coordinate adjacent to this coordinate
        Returns:
        an array containing all of the coordinates that are adjacent to this coordinate.
